findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify tax and liquidity fees which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude addresses from fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing divisor, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can include and exclude addresses from blacklist
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include and exclude addresses from the blacklist.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the buyback feature.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable before and after presale modes.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Potential for owner to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, which allows them to retake privileges even after the ownership was renounced.
